title: How to Make a Creamy Coffee

steps.headline: Take a spoon of instant coffee and add it in a mug.
Add cream.
steps.description: Add little bit of it otherwise it will be spoiled.

steps.headline: Add cream again (less than one teaspoon).
The creamy coffee is ready!
steps.description: Go ahead and take a sip!

text: Take a spoon of instant coffee and add it in a mug.  Add sugar.  Add cream. Add little bit of it otherwise it will be spoiled. Mix it for 2 to 3 minutes.  Add cream again (less than one teaspoon).  Mix it for 3 minutes.  Add hot milk.  The creamy coffee is ready! Go ahead and take a sip!
